attributes.action: Publicly condemn the executions of  Christians in North Korea and take action to stop it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Human Rights groups have reported that North Korea has stepped up its persecution of citizens who practice Christianity. 

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/asia-pacific/8167644.stm

These Christians who are forced to follow their religion in secret for fear of Government response, have no voice unless we give it to them. 

For simply wanting to follow a certain religious path they are being hunted and killed, many times executed in public. Even for something as simple as owning a bible.

As a Christian nation we owe it to these victims to stand shoulder to shoulder with them and condemn in the strongest terms what is happening. 

The government should demand a stop to this crime against humanity and take action to make sure it stops.
